title: Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps the weekend in sports. Are the Bucs & Packers in trouble? Former NFL Linebacker Lavar Arrington tells us who he thinks is the best football player of all-time. Tampa Times' Rick Stroud shares his perspective of what's happening with the Bucs and Tom Brady. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
